title: Car Hauling Dispatcher
desc: Sargent Logistics is American transportation and logistics company with a head office based in Chicago, IL.Due to extending company‚Äôs Car Haulers fleet we are looking for an experienced Car Haulers Dispatcher to join our team in the Kyiv office.Requirements: excellent verbal and written English skills; 1+ years of dispatching experience working with Car Haulers or other equipment (DryVans, FlatBeds, etc.) within US market; negotiation and communication skills; ability to work and multitask in fast paced environment; strong problem solving skills. Responsibilities: booking loads for company drivers; establishing and developing relations with customers/ brokers; routes planning. We offer: office work at the Kyiv city center or remote work; afternoon schedule: 15:00 ‚Äî 00:00 with 1 hour for relocation; paid time off (vacation and sick leaves); salary paid in USD ($1000 + 1% gross or 2.5% gross). If you are looking for a place to develop your career, we are waiting for you!

title: Logistics Coordinator (shifts schedule)
desc: Sargent Logistics INC is an American transportation company with a head office based in Chicago, IL. Our company provides transportation services throughout the US, with target markets in Washington, Oregon, California (South and North), the Midwest, and the East Coast. Due to company‚Äôs fleet expanding, we are looking for a Logistics Operations Assistant to join our team in the Kyiv office. Requirements excellent verbal and written English skills; 1+ years experience in logistics area (at support, dispatching or other relevant positions); extreme focus on organisation and time management; ability to work independently as well as part of a team; ability to work and multitask in a fast-paced environment; strong problem-solving skills. Essential Functions monitoring/supervision of fleet and drivers; communicate with our drivers, staff members, and customers, assist them with various inquiries; planning and expediting transportation pipeline; following up on deliveries and pick-ups performed by assigned drivers. What we offer competitive salary (paid in USD with all the taxes covered); paid training and internship; clear career growth options; paid time off. Employment conditions office work at the Kyiv city center. Remote isn‚Äôt considered; shifts Schedule (16‚àí18 shifts monthly): 5 working days/ 3 days off Morning shift (7 AM ‚Äî 2 PM); Afternoon shift (2 PM ‚Äî 10 PM); Night shift (10 PM ‚Äî 7 AM). (Please note, that the schedule includes all shifts).If you‚Äôre looking for a place to develop your career, we are waiting for you!

Work experience of at least two years; Knowledge of analytical chemistry, knowledge of the principles of chromatographic and spectrometric equipment; Practical experience with analytical equipment (chromatographs (GC, GC/MS, GC/MSD, FTIR, atomic emission spectrometers) is desirable; Proficiency in Ukrainian and Russian; Proficiency in English ‚Äî above average (reading professional literature, telephone conversations, e-mails); Confident user of MS Office; Driver‚Äôs license and experience of driving a car is desirable ‚ÄãJob description Search for potential customers of equipment; Selection of the right equipment for analytical purposes and preparation of commercial proposals; Negotiation of contracts for the supply of equipment and their support. Tender preparation and tendering. Participation in events organized by the company (presentations, exhibitions, seminars, etc.); Position combines office work with business trip within the territory of Ukraine. ‚ÄãProfessional and personal qualities: ‚ÄãOptimism and positive attitude to life. The ability to understand the problems of customers and propose solutions to analytical problems; Such qualities as initiative and diplomacy Responsibility and accuracy in paperwork Communicability and willingness to work in collaboration with other staff. Company offers: Salary based on the results of interview (with a growth perspective); Official employment and observance of Labor Code of Ukraine. Social package ‚Äî corporative mobile phones, medical insurance, lunch at the workplace; Possibility to work in a team of professionals in a comfortable office (22/1 Ivana Kudri street off. 70). Irregular working hours. Probationary period of 3‚àí12 months. A detailed SV in Russian (Ukrainian or English), which should reflect the quality of the applicant as set out in the ¬´Candidate requirements¬ª should be sent to [–≤—ñ–¥–≥—É–∫–Ω—É—Ç–∏—Å—è].‚ÄãPlease contact the secretary of the company Pavlova Svetlana to set the date of the interview (after sending SV), (044) 521‚àí95‚àí40–ü–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç–∏ —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω or (050) 384‚àí69‚àí97–ü–æ–∫–∞–∑–∞—Ç–∏ —Ç–µ–ª–µ—Ñ–æ–Ω.
